abstract: Sets the tint color within this control template.

declaration.code: @MainActor @preconcurrency func tint(_ tint: Color?) -> some ControlWidgetTemplate

overview:
## Discussion

Controls don’t respect the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/tint(_:)] modifier when applied to control labels, nor do controls support arbitrary tint shape styles. Instead, define a tint color for your control by applying this modifier to its template:
title: tint(_:)
